about_me.title: About Me
about_me.subtitle: Bryan Grandon - Junior Frontend Developer
paragraph: Junior frontend developer focused on creating modern, user-friendly web interfaces and turning ideas into seamless digital experiences.
Committed to continuous learning and growth. Each project represents a new opportunity for growth, innovation, and improvement.
Constantly improving to develop quality code, tackle challenges creatively, and create engaging user experiences.
